mapper.insert: insert into tbl_plan (planLectureIdx, planMemberId, planContent, planDate) values (#{planLectureIdx}, #{planMemberId}, #{planContent}, #{planDate})
mapper.select: select tp.planIdx as planIdx, tp.planLectureIdx as planLectureIdx, tl.lectureTitle as lectureTitle , tp.planMemberId as planMemberId , tp.planContent as planContent, tp.planDate as planDate , tp.planCreatedAt as planCreatedAt, tp.planUpdatedAt as planUpdatedAt from tbl_plan as tp inner join tbl_lecture as tl on tp.planLectureIdx = tl.lectureIdx where tp.planIdx = #{planIdx}
mapper.update: update tbl_plan set planLectureIdx = #{planLectureIdx}, planContent = #{planContent}, planDate = #{planDate}, planUpdatedAt = now() where planIdx = #{planIdx}
